description: <p>Columbia Health is a Registered Opioid Overdose Prevention Program, recognized by New York City and State Departments of Health. As part of this work, Columbia Health is offering virtual Naloxone training via Zoom to members of the Columbia University community. Naloxone kits&nbsp;can be picked up from Columbia Health or mailed to participants upon completion of training.&nbsp;If you would like to learn more about the training, please visit&nbsp;<a href="https://health.columbia.edu/content/naloxone-training">https://health.columbia.edu/content/naloxone-training</a>.</p>\n<p>Registration required.</p>\n<p><strong>Register for the July 11, 3:30&nbsp;- 4:30 PM ET&nbsp;session:&nbsp;</strong><a href="https://bit.ly/3PTb0gV">https://bit.ly/3PTb0gV</a></p>

description: <p>Columbia Health is a Registered Opioid Overdose Prevention Program, recognized by New York City and State Departments of Health. As part of this work, Columbia Health is offering virtual Naloxone training via Zoom to members of the Columbia University community. summary: International Overdose Awareness Day: Virtual Naloxone Training
description: <p>August 31 is International Overdose Awareness Day. Columbia Health is a Registered Opioid Overdose Prevention Program, recognized by New York City and State Departments of Health. This designation came as part of a collaboration with researchers from the Mailman School of Public Health and the School of General Studies. As part of this work, Columbia Health is offering virtual Naloxone training via Zoom to members of the Columbia University community. Naloxone kits&nbsp;can be picked up from Columbia Health or mailed to participants upon completion of training.&nbsp;If you would like to learn more about the training, please visit&nbsp;<a href="https://health.columbia.edu/content/naloxone-training">https://health.columbia.edu/content/naloxone-training</a>.</p>\n<p>Registration required.</p>\n<p><strong>Register for the August 31, 3:30 - 4:30&nbsp;PM ET&nbsp;session:&nbsp;</strong><a href="https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F3QE0BoZ&amp;data=05%7C01%7Ckm3710%40cumc.columbia.edu%7C8c1d358196a74cfa483b08da7ae3d2af%7Cb0002a9b0017404d97dc3d3bab09be81%7C1%7C0%7C637957416154521418%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&amp;sdata=Ef21oXjL9CxEMdlsdaPgaC8LyUM7Ifc5fbaCIMEiTeM%3D&amp;reserved=0">https://bit.ly/3QE0BoZ</a></p>
